item.content:encoded:
Projects

Skills

  • Programming language
    • Go, Python, Javascript(Node, React, Meteor), Solidity
    • Assembly, C, C++, C#, Java, Objective-C
    • ML, MATLAB, PHP, JSP, SQL
  • Platform
    • Ethereum, IPFS, Loom network, Remix, Truffle

    • Android, iOS, Tizen, Firebase
    • Cocos, Unity, UDK
    • AUTOSAR
    • AWS EC2, RDS, Lambda
    • GAE(Google App Engine)
    • RabbitMQ, Websocket, RTC
    • Anaconda, Docker
    • Tensorflow, Keras
    • OpenGL, OpenCV
    • MSSQL, MySQL, PostgreSQL, DynamoDB, LevelDB
    • ELK(Elastic search & Logstash & Kibana)

    • NS2, OCaml

Award

Publications

Languages

  • Korean, English, Japanese

Education

  • M.S. and Ph.D. Candidate, Computer Science, Seoul National University, Korea, 2017
  • B.S., Computer Science, Kwangwoon University, Korea, 2012
  • Extra
    • Software Maestro, Ministry of Science, Korea, 2013-2014
    • Self-Driving Car Nanodegree Term1 and Term2, Udacity, 2017
